name: Mikha
wishText: Happy Valentine’s Day, my love! ❤️ From the moment our souls intertwined, you’ve become the rhythm of my heart, the warmth in my days, and the dream I never want to wake from. Every glance, every touch, every whispered ‘I love you’ is etched in my soul, a melody that plays endlessly in my heart. You are my greatest adventure, my sweetest love, and my forever. No words could ever capture the depth of my love for you, but know this—every heartbeat of mine belongs to you, today, tomorrow, and always. 💕
